Welcome to Sportal Manager!

Here at Sportal Manager we take care of your sports and events managment needs all in one application! Some of the things you can do with Sportal Manager is:

  • Create events with detailed description
  • A scedule for your fans and loyal attendees
  • Live score updates
  • Manage and mantain your workers for specific events
  • Ticketing for all hosted events
  • And so much more...

Make an account with us to see your favorite orginzations scedules and events or if your an owner contact us directly so we can get you started on creating an engaging platform for all your events! Contact us at: sportalmanager@gmail.com


About Us: This applications intent is to help school athletic direcotors and managment be able to manage thier sports and school events more effentiently. This was also created to challenge us as programmers and devolpers, to create a full stack application that solves a real world problem. We have created both the frontend and the backend for this application and if you like it please reach out to one of our links!This application was created by one person. Thank you for choosing us - The Sportal Team

Created and designed by Blake Graviett
